person.persName: Wiley B. Laffoon (Hopkins Co., KY, farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Rutherford Laffoon and Sarah Laffoon. Married to Martha J. Laffoon. Father of Mary A. Laffoon, Sarah E. Laffoon, H. C. Laffoon, and Georgia Laffoon. Resident of Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.
